document.full_text: miami heat basketball forward chris bosh has filed a lawsuit to prevent his ex-girlfriend who is the mother of his child from appearing on the next season of vh1's reality show "basketball wives."
document.title: miami heat star sues to keep ex off "basketball wives"
lines_and_colors: miami heat basketball forward chris bosh has filed a lawsuit to prevent his ex-girlfriend who is the mother of his child from appearing on the next season of vh1's reality show "basketball wives."
